text: wlqd darabna lhwla' almushrikin biallah fi hadha alquran min kuli mathal min 'amthal alqurun alkhaliat tkhwyfana wthdhyrana; lytdhkru fynzjru eamaa hum ealayh mqymwn min alkufr ballh. wajaealna hdha alquran erbyana wadih alalfaz sahl almeany, la labs fih wala anhraf; laealahum yataqun allah bamtthal awamrh wajtnab nwahyh
